msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

msItem.title: The third chapter of a Persian translation of the Arabic Kitab Usfutas,
msItem.note: As Ellis 11 (1) For other details see Ellis No 11 (1). On spells suitable for different periods of the zodiac year. As Ellis No 11 (1). Contains many lively pen-and-ink drawings of pictures to be used in spells. The Arabic original here attributed to Siraj al-Din Abu Ya'qub al-Sakkaki.
msItem.incipit: Miguyad kih Abu Bakr b. Tahir

listBibl.bibl: Manfred Ullmann, Die Natur- und Geheimwissenschaften im Islam, p. 375.
For Sakkaki see Encyclopaedia of Islam, 2nd edition.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
